text: Bootle is a town in Sefton, Merseyside. == Transport == === Road === The A565, A5057 and A5058 roads pass through Bootle. === Rail === Bootle has two train stations: Bootle Oriel Road and Bootle New Strand. === Ferry === There are ferries available to Dublin from Bootle. However, these are freight only. == References == Category:Towns in Merseyside Category:Metropolitan Borough of Sefton
title: Bootle
